name: DataPower Database File
summary: Learn about .DP1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DataPower was sold by Iota Software to Logotron, which renamed it ViewPoint. DataPower is no longer developed for Windows, but is still available for RISC OS systems.

description: Database format used by DataPower, a user-friendly multimedia database program; can be created using the form designer within DataPower.
